entries.title: Opening Keynote: Future of Nuclear Monitoring
entries.description: Dr. Sarah Chen from Stanford University presents groundbreaking research on next-generation seismic detection algorithms that could revolutionize nuclear test monitoring. This keynote explores how artificial intelligence and machine learning are transforming the field of nuclear verification.
